name: Rainmaker
headline: DeFi for Everyone
description: Rainmaker is an account abstraction-based crypto wallet that makes DeFi investing simple and fast. Set up a wallet with just an email, instantly deposit funds from your bank or credit card, and invest in DeFi without gas fees.

founders.name: Carlos Reyes Stoneham, Founder
founders.description: Founder of Rainmaker. Previously PM & Engineer.

founders.name: Brent Traut, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of rainmaker.nyc • Previously Apple, Microsoft, Pinterest, Hashflow, and lifetime startup hacker

generated_description:
Rainmaker is shaking things up in the decentralized finance (DeFi) space. Founded in 2022 and currently part of Y Combinator's W23 batch, Rainmaker is all about making DeFi accessible to everyone. Their mantra, "DeFi for Everyone," encapsulates their mission perfectly.

So, what exactly is Rainmaker? Initially, it's designed as an account abstraction-based crypto wallet. In layman's terms, this means users can create a wallet with just an email address—no complicated processes required. They enable instant deposits from bank accounts or credit cards and remove gas fees, which can often complicate investments in DeFi. This approach is all about making investing in DeFi as simple and fast as possible.

With a compact team of just two and under the guidance of their Group Partner, Harj Taggar, Rainmaker is positioned to make a significant impact in the growing DeFi market. Although they are still in the early stages of their journey, their innovative solutions could change how regular folks interact with decentralized finance.

If you're curious, you can learn more or get started on their official site: [Rainmaker](http://www.rainmaker.nyc). Keep an eye on this one—it could be a game changer in making DeFi much more user-friendly.
